plot: When super villains kill all of the worlds best superheroes, all that's left to oppose them is... well the worst ones. Can three lame superheroes beat the odds and save the world? Probable not.
title: Team Useless
plot_es: When super villains kill all of the worlds best superheroes, all that's left to oppose them is... well the worst ones. Can three lame superheroes beat the odds and save the world? Probable not.
plot_en: When super villains kill all of the worlds best superheroes, all that's left to oppose them is... well the worst ones. Can three lame superheroes beat the odds and save the world? Probable not.

cast.role: Captain state the obvious and Gatt Man
cast.name: Jez Murdock
